physical_examinations.changes_over_time: HbA1c levels increased to the diabetes range (>6.5% [47 mmol/mol]) by the next assessment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Absence of impaired fasting glucose previously observed. Elevated insulin level noted at 1-hour post-load.
Daily ambulatory glucose profile showed 77% of interstitial glucose values within target range (80-140 mg/dl; 4.4-7.8 mmol/L).
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicates improvement in glucose management despite weight fluctuations.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Presence of lipodystrophy with facial and lower extremity lipoatrophy.
